testcase.classname: Login functionality on Practice Test Automation site
testcase.name: Positive LogIn test
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters student and Password123....................................passed And clicks login button.....................................................passed Then user logged in successfully to home page...............................passed

testcase.classname: Login functionality on Practice Test Automation site
testcase.name: Negative username test
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters "incorrectUser" and "Password123"..........................passed And clicks login button.....................................................passed Then error message is displayed for invalid username........................passed

testcase.classname: Login functionality on Practice Test Automation site
testcase.name: Negative password test
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user gives "student" and "incorrectPassword" for login.................passed And clicks login button.....................................................passed Then error message is displayed for invalid password........................passed
